snippet: Rosberg earned a chance to tighten his Formula One championship duel with his Mercedes teammate Lewis Hamilton by winning the pole position for the United States Grand Prix in Austin, Tex.
abstract: Nico Rosberg wins pole position for the United States Grand Prix in Austin, Tex.
lead_paragraph: Rosberg earned a chance to tighten his Formula One championship duel with his Mercedes teammate Lewis Hamilton by winning the pole position for the United States Grand Prix in Austin, Tex.
